characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance, Oathbringer

characterDescription:
Tearim was Captain of the King's Guard* during Gavilar Kholin's reign.  He was seen by Jasnah wearing Gavilar's Shardplate (who'd stopped wearing it of late, preferring to entrust it to Tearim) just prior to Gavilar's assasination. He was known as one of the world's great duelists.
Tearim wore Dalinar's extra Plate for the battle with Kalanor's army; Plate which technically still belonged to Evi at the time.
